tails.com | Front-end & Full Stack Developers | Richmond, London | ONSITE, full time

tails.com is a tech-centric startup, using the power of technology combined with applied nutritional science to change the world of dog food for good.

So much more than just a website, our intelligent systems formulate and fulfil bespoke, individually optimised blends of food for each dog, and we evolve that blend over time to match the dogs' constantly changing nutritional needs. Orders are delivered direct to owners' doorsteps every month all across the country; every bag of food that leaves our blending facility is totally unique.

We launched in July 2014 and we're currently expanding the current team of 9 with developers of both front- and back-end persuasions. The platform is Python based, though we've flirted with Go recently too, and with an ex-Amazon architect among our tech founders we of course make full use of AWS in building a robust, distributed set of applications and services.

If you're interested in finding out more, head to https://tails.com/careers or drop an email to steve@tails.com.
